title: AMD announces its Ryzen PRO 6000 processors for business laptops
content:
While AMD announced its Ryzen 6000 mobile processors earlier this year, now it’s time for its Ryzen PRO 6000 chips, which are being announced today. The company is calling them the world’s most advanced processors for business laptops, which is a bold claim as these stand up against Intel’s 12th-gen vPro chips. First of all,

The post AMD announces its Ryzen PRO 6000 processors for business laptops appeared first on xda-developers.
description: AMD is announcing its Ryzen PRO 6000 processors, which have additional hardware-based security features aimed at businesses.
